name: Skull Dude
description:
Join Skull Dude in his quest to grow a pumpkin!

Wander around a swamp!

Play retro mini games!

[I ran out of features! This game is kinda short, and saving isn't possible.]

WASD/ARROWS to move

Enter/E to interact

ESC to exit/cancel.

This game was made for the Game In A Week #2 Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/giaw2
